responses: It can also be a great physical and mental challenge and get your adrenaline flowing, a feeling many people like.

It can provide a lot of benefits to the body and mind.  It can help people become strong and can improve their overall health.  It can also provide many mental benefits such as improving mood, social skills and coping abilities, and providing a distraction from everyday stresses.
